item.description: Ford Hall Forum: George Lakoff ? Thursday, June 5 at 6:30 p.m., Rabb Lecture Hall, ext. 2212. Professor George Lakoff author of Moral Politics: How Liberals and Conservatives Think, Whose Freedom?, and Don't Think of an Elephant!, explores the connections between cognitive science and political action. Why do many Americans vote against their own interests. Humans, he argues, are not the rational creatures we?ve so long imagined ourselves to be. And savvy political campaigns should not assume people will use objective reasoning when deciding how to vote. Book signing will follow.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: George Lakoff author of Moral Politics @ BPL
